Containers.Name: Duplicati
Containers.Changes:
[center][font size=4]Duplicati Change Log[/font][/center]
[font size=3]2018.07.11[/font] - Initial Release
Containers.Description:
Duplicati docker image[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] This image is based on the linuxserver/duplicati image. [br][br]
[span style='color: #E80000;']8200[/span] is the port used for Duplicati[br] To access the Duplicati GUI, open the WebUI by browsing to the IP:PORT address.[br][br] By default, this version of Duplicati is installed: LATEST[br]
Containers.Overview: Duplicati allows you to backup data to another location through several transmission protocols.
